statement.title: Content
statement.content:
Calculate $a+b$.

In this problem, $a$ and $b$ may be presented as *Octal*, *Decimal* or *Hexadecimal*.

statement.title: Standard Input
statement.content:
Two integer $a,b (0 \leq a,b < 16^{10000})$

Each line contains one integer.

statement.title: Samples
statement.content:
Input Output
1 023
0X2 0x35
